scripts.install:backend: cd backend && echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && npm ci || (echo 'Backend install failed' && exit 1)
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend && echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && npm ci || (echo 'Frontend install failed' && exit 1)
scripts.install: echo 'Starting root installation...' && npm ci && echo 'Root dependencies installed' && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.deploy:render: npm run install && npm run build
